support-hed: An urgent request (and a special 2X offer)
support-text: We find ourselves at pivotal crossroads, and the future — and our own legacy — is at stake. There are more forces at work than ever to silence free and fearless reporting, and there are fewer resources than ever to undertake the unbiased investigative journalism Spotlight PA produces. This legacy is not about us or me or Spotlight PA. It’s not even about journalism or the news. It’s about a free society, which necessarily depends on the free flow of information grounded in truth and reality. If we lose that, we lose everything — and we will be forced to reckon with our own inaction. But there is still time to join together and chart a better course. There are still professional journalists and independent organizations like Spotlight PA willing to take on the tough task of fighting on the front lines for the truth without fear or favor. They don’t do it for fame or glory, but out of a sense of duty and service. And they cannot do it without you. Right now, your tax-deductible support will ensure our vital work can continue. And for a limited time, every dollar you give will be matched — that's DOUBLE your gift — by the Lenfest Institute for Journalism. — Christopher Baxter, CEO/President PS: If you prefer to mail a check, you can send it to: Spotlight PA, PO Box 11728, Harrisburg, PA 17108-1728
takeover-dek: We only have 6 days left to raise $12,000 to ensure our unmatched nonpartisan, nonprofit reporting can continue. Give to Spotlight PA today & get it DOUBLED »
